Item.method_code: ' sets various icons on the Document item grids ' called onAfterGet ' By Rolf Laudenbach 4/2012 extended logic to include more icons. ' cloned from method from Nate Brown 3/20/2012 'MethodTemplateName=VBMain; Function Main() As Item 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() Dim myItems As Item = Me.getItemsByXPath("//Result/Item") Dim I As Integer If myItems.getItemByIndex(0).getAttribute("type","") <> "Item Folder" Then Return Me 'nothing to do For i=0 To myItems.getItemCount()-1 Dim myItem As Item = myItems.getItemByIndex(I) ' -- has Files icon If Not myItem.getProperty("has_files") Is Nothing Then Dim hasFiles As String = myItem.getProperty("has_files") myItem.setProperty("has_files_icon",fn_GetHasFilesIcon(hasFiles)) End If Next Return Me End Function '------------- Private Function fn_GetHasFilesIcon (hasFilesValue As String) As String Dim IconName As String = "" If hasFilesValue = "1" Then IconName = "" Return IconName End Function
Item.name: Show Folder Grid Icons
